note: degree from Strathclyde University, Glasgow in 1969. He obtained a Ph.D. degree from the University of Bradford, England in 1977.
title: About the Author Vijay Kumar Sood obtained his B.Sc.(1st Class Hons.) from University College, Nairobi in 1967 and his M.Sc

note: he also joined Concordia University, Montreal as an Adjunct Professor.
title: From 1969-76, he was employed at the BR Railway Technical Centre, Derby, UK. In 1976, he emigrated to Canada and was employed as a Researcher at IREQ (Hydro-Québec) in Montreal

container-title: He has received numerous awards; among them are the 1998 Outstanding Service Award from IEEE Canada, the 1999 Meritas Award from the Ordre des ingènieurs du Québec, the IEEE Third Millennium Award from IEEE in
title: He is a Member of the Ordre des ingènieurs du Québec, a Senior Member of the Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers (IEEE), a member of IEE (UK) and a Fellow of the Engineering Institute of Canada

container-title: He is presently the Managing Editor of the IEEE Canadian Review (a quarterly journal of IEEE Canada
title: the IEEE Regional Activities Board Achievement Award for 2001, and the Engineering Institute of Canada’s Canadian Pacific Railway Engineering Medal for 2002

container-title: a Director and Treasurer of IEEE Montreal Conferences Inc. and a Director of the IEEE Canadian Foundation
title: He serves as an associate editor of the journal Control Engineering Practice for Pergamon Press
